jobsJson.descriptionPlain: The task of Corporate Strategy team is to oversee different moving components of Gojek as a whole business and align all products to move forward in the same direction. We help and give recommendations for the management to make important decisions, and then we act as a facilitator for different products and functions to ensure exceptional execution. Our role is just like the strategic Intelligence team, to become one of the pillars of Corporate Strategy that provides the whole team with a stream of data, reports, and analysis. We also support other units, within and outside Corporate Strategy division to make sure Gojek as a company, knows where we are and where should be and where should we move on to next.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Be the data partner for the Corporate Strategy team to develop strategic initiatives
  • Doing deep-dive analytics to answer the business question 
  • Build report and dashboard to monitor corporate level OKR and important metrics
  • Evaluate data flow process & data output and give improvement suggestions
  • Intermediate relevant communication between other product and function
  • Deliver work not limited to business analysis using statistical tools, data visualization tools (Tableau, Metabase, etc), as well as data crunching with SQL
  • Be a nice person

• 1-3 years of experience working with SQL, good at data visualization and dashboarding tool (Tableau/Metabase/etc)
  • Have strong business sense with data-driven mindset, goal-oriented, and also excellent in communication and good at collaborative working
  • Fair understanding of Shell script Familiar with ETL / Airflow Goal-oriented with creative thinking while also interested or experienced in Machine Learning using R/Python
  • Have had an experience or exposure with finance/business field
